CardDeck main¶

class card_deck.card_deck.Deck[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents the deck of cards

deal_one_card()[source]¶

Deals one card from the deck

shuffle_deck()[source]¶

Shuffles the card Deck

class card_deck.card_deck.Start[source]¶

Bases: object

A user can: 1. Draw a card as many times as they wish, until the deck is depleted 2. Shuffle the entire deck at any time 3. See a list of the cards they’ve drawn so far 4. Quit playing with the deck (Exit the program)

start_game()[source]¶

Starts the card game
